Notes.Text:
This update for kernel-firmware fixes the following issue:

- CVE-2020-12321: Updated the Intel Bluetooth firmware for buffer overflow security bugs (bsc#1178671).

Vulnerabilities.Description: Improper buffer restriction in some Intel(R) Wireless Bluetooth(R) products before version 21.110 may allow an unauthenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilege via adjacent access.
